content.p: How we make decisions Unreserved minutes of meetings of the University Council, Senate, and other senior committees are available on request. Please note that information in these minutes may be withheld if it is covered by one or more of the exemptions set out in the Act. If this is the case, we will inform you why the information has been withheld. Minutes, agendas, reports and papers Minutes Please Contact: rowena.hall@nottingham.ac.uk Appointment Committees & Procedures Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
